itemLabel: Mark Saville, Baron Saville of Newdigate

wikipedia_page.main: Mark Oliver Saville, Baron Saville of Newdigate, PC (born 20 March 1936) is a British judge and former Justice of the Supreme Court of the United Kingdom.
